match.title: 6th Match
match.statusText: Zimbabwe won by 3 wickets (with 3 balls remaining)

image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start

notes: Mehrab Hossain's century was the first for Bangladesh in one-day internationals

milestones.description: Akram Khan has scored 4 fifty-plus scores in ODIs, the most for BAN breaking Athar Ali Khan's record
Shahriar Hossain and Mehrab Hossain's 170-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 1st wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 137 between Athar Ali Khan and Mohammad Rafique
Mehrab Hossain's 101 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for BAN), surpassing Shahriar Hossain's 95
Akram Khan has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (26) for BAN, going past Aminul Islam
Shahriar Hossain and Mehrab Hossain's 170-run partnership is BAN's highest for any wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 137 between Mohammad Rafique and Athar Ali Khan

recentMatches.title: 6th Match
recentMatches.statusText: Zimbabwe won by 3 wickets (with 3 balls remaining)

image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start
